sourcesContent:
<template>
  <ion-page>
    <ion-header>
      <ion-toolbar>
        <ion-title v-if="showUser">Hola {{ user.name }}!</ion-title>
        <ion-title v-if="!showUser">Iniciar sesión</ion-title>
      </ion-toolbar>
    </ion-header>

    <ion-content :fullscreen="true">
      <ion-header collapse="condense">
        <ion-toolbar>
          <ion-title size="large" v-if="showUser"
            >Hola {{ user.name }}!</ion-title
          >
          <ion-title size="large" v-if="!showUser">Iniciar sesión</ion-title>
        </ion-toolbar>
      </ion-header>

      <InfoUserSession price="12,55€" v-if="showUser" />

      <LoginRegisterSession v-if="!showUser" />

      <ion-button @click="loginsaver"> SAVER </ion-button>
      <ion-button @click="loginverifier"> VERIFIER </ion-button>
      <ion-button @click="barscanner"> SCANNER+ </ion-button>
      <ion-button @click="photo"> PHOTO+ </ion-button>
      <ion-button @click="storage()"> STORAGE CLEAR </ion-button>
      
    </ion-content>
  </ion-page>
</template>

<script>
import {
  IonPage,
  IonHeader,
  IonToolbar,
  IonTitle,
  IonContent,
  IonButton,
} from "@ionic/vue";

import { FingerprintAIO } from "@ionic-native/fingerprint-aio";
import { BarcodeScanner } from "@ionic-native/barcode-scanner";
import { KeychainTouchId } from "@ionic-native/keychain-touch-id";
import { Camera } from "@ionic-native/camera";

import { FileTransfer } from "@ionic-native/file-transfer";

import axios from "axios";
import { NativeStorage } from "@ionic-native/native-storage";

import InfoUserSession from "../components/InfoUserSession";
import LoginRegisterSession from "../components/LoginRegisterSession";

import { defineComponent } from "vue";

export default defineComponent({
  name: "HomeFragment",
  components: {
    IonPage,
    IonHeader,
    IonToolbar,
    IonTitle,
    IonContent,
    IonButton,
    InfoUserSession,
    LoginRegisterSession,
  },
  data: function () {
    return {
      source: "",
      name: "",
      showUser: true,
      user: {
        name: this.a,
      },
      code: "",
      content: "",
      optionsCamera: {
        quality: 75,
        destinationType: Camera.DestinationType.FILE_URI,
        encodingType: Camera.EncodingType.JPEG,
        mediaType: Camera.MediaType.PICTURE,
      },
    };
  },
  mounted: function(){
    NativeStorage.getItem('login').then(res => {
      this.user.name=res;
      this.showUser=true;
    }).catch(() => {
      this.showUser=false;
    })
  },
  methods: {
    storage: function () {
      NativeStorage.clear().then(() => alert("Content erased!"));
    },
    photo: function () {
      Camera.getPicture(this.optionsCamera)
        .then((imageData) => {
          // imageData is either a base64 encoded string or a file URI
          // If it's base64 (DATA_URL):

          const f = FileTransfer.create();

          f.upload(imageData, "http://192.168.1.41:2999/upload", {
            fileKey: "file",
            fileName: "test.jpg",
          }).then((data) => {
            alert("Success: " + data);
          });
        })
        .catch((err) => {
          alert("Error: " + err);
        });
    },
    login: function () {
      FingerprintAIO.show({
        title: "Login",
        subtitle: "Please login to connect to the servers",
        description: "This is authentication",
      })
        .then((result) => {
          alert(result + " OK!");
        })
        .catch((err) => {
          alert(err + " ERROR!");
        });
    },
    loginsaver: function () {
      KeychainTouchId.isAvailable()
        .then((res) => {
          const pass = "123123";

          KeychainTouchId.save("user1", pass, true)
            .then((res2) => {
              alert("Login info saved" + res + "-" + res2);
            })
            .catch((err2) => {
              alert("Error: " + err2);
            });
        })
        .catch((err) => alert("Error: " + err));
    },
    loginverifier: function () {
      KeychainTouchId.isAvailable()
        .then(() => {
          KeychainTouchId.verify("user1", "Use to unlock app")
            .then((res2) => {
              alert("User: user1 and Password: " + res2);
            })
            .catch((err2) => {
              alert("Error: " + err2);
            });
        })
        .catch((err) => alert("Error: " + err));
    },
    barscanner: function () {
      BarcodeScanner.scan()
        .then((barcodeData) => {
          //alert("Barcode data: " + barcodeData.text);
          this.code = barcodeData.text;

          axios({
            url: "http://192.168.1.41:3013/code?code=" + this.code,
            method: "get",
          }).then((response) => {
            this.source = response.data[2];
            this.name = response.data[0];
            this.content = response.data[1];
          });
        })
        .catch((err) => {
          alert("Error: " + err);
        });
    },
    test: function () {
      this.code = "8470001790590";

      axios({
        url: "http://192.168.1.41:3012/code?code=" + this.code,
        method: "get",
      }).then((response) => {
        this.source = response.data[0];
        this.name = response.data[1].substring(0, 35) + "...";
      });
    },
  },
});
</script>
